title:
Eric,



Can you tell us readers the Varsity Football won-loss records for,



New Hanover High

Hoggard High

Ashley High

Laney High Schools.



From 2006--to present.

This is for games versus 3A and 4A opposing schools only.....not 1A or 2A.

We are trying to find but no composite records?

Please assist/Thank You!
